definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Xuzhou, mausoleum of the king of Chu Country (about 2148 years ago), where Lanling Meijiu liquor was unearthed;
sentences.chinese: 徐州楚王陵出土的蘭陵美酒距今已有2148年。

sentences.english: A decent meal and a drink afterward were not the worst way to go.
sentences.chinese: 一頓美餐然後一瓶美酒，這不算上西天的最差待遇。

sentences.english: Touch a pot of wine, drink it, drunk beautiful voice.
sentences.chinese: 觸一壺美酒，飲盡惆悵，醉美心聲。

sentences.english: Fine Lanling wine expires tulip's fragrance.
This is a cup gathers completely the happy good wine, only has moistened your my bilabial.
sentences.chinese: 這是一杯蓄滿幸福的美酒，就只沾過你我的雙脣。

sentences.english: I'd love to  gaze upon that  enchanting beard over a delicious  beverage.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看你那迷人的鬍子垂在美酒上的樣子。

sentences.english: Gisborne is a city where you can indulge in gourmet dining and wine tasting.
sentences.chinese: 吉斯伯恩是一個讓你縱情享受美酒佳餚的城市。

sentences.english: You will be wined and dined with an array of enticing international and Greek cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 而午餐和晚餐也有大量國際美食和美酒可供選擇。

sentences.english: They say love and friendship in marriage can be like wine…it only gets better with age.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，婚姻中的愛情和友誼就像美酒，歷久彌香。

sentences.english: Marriage is just like wine getting better with age.
WenDaoHe sword male is heard at this time, and have brought wine.
sentences.chinese: 聞道和劍雄此時也聞聲趕來，並帶來了美酒。

sentences.english: Red wine popple sweet in glass.
sentences.chinese: 通透的玻璃杯盪漾着美酒流芳。

sentences.english: We will extol your love more than wine.
sentences.chinese: 我們要稱讚你的愛情，勝似稱讚美酒。

sentences.english: No song unsung, no wine, untasted.
sentences.chinese: 生活只有美酒，只有歡唱。

sentences.english: Wine abounds here since ancient times, which, by the middle of the Liulin Town Wine is the best.
sentences.chinese: 這裏自古盛產美酒，唯以柳林鎮所產之酒爲上乘。

sentences.english: Kang million wine makes a man healthy and weathy.
sentences.chinese: 中原財神康百萬，百萬美酒天下傳。
